81 class sickLDMRSscan
82 {
83 public:
84  ros::NodeHandle n_;
85  ros::Subscriber scan0_subscriber;
86  ros::Subscriber scan1_subscriber;
87  ros::Subscriber scan2_subscriber;
88  ros::Subscriber scan3_subscriber;
89  sensor_msgs::LaserScan scan0;
90  sensor_msgs::LaserScan scan1;
91  sensor_msgs::LaserScan scan2;
92  sensor_msgs::LaserScan scan3;
93 
94  sickLDMRSscan()
95  {
96  //Topics I want to subscribe
97  scan0_subscriber=n_.subscribe("/sickldmrs/scan0", 1000, &sickLDMRSscan::scan0Update, this);
98  scan1_subscriber=n_.subscribe("/sickldmrs/scan1", 1000, &sickLDMRSscan::scan1Update, this);
99  scan2_subscriber=n_.subscribe("/sickldmrs/scan2", 1000, &sickLDMRSscan::scan2Update, this);
100  scan3_subscriber=n_.subscribe("/sickldmrs/scan3", 1000, &sickLDMRSscan::scan3Update, this);
101  }
102 
103  void scan0Update(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan& msg)
104  {
105  scan0=msg;
106  //ROS_INFO("Scan time: %lf ", msg.ranges[1]);
107  }
108 
109  void scan1Update(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan& msg)
110  {
111  scan1=msg;
112  //ROS_INFO("Scan time: %lf ", msg.ranges[1]);
113  }
114 
115  void scan2Update(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan& msg)
116  {
117  scan2=msg;
118  //ROS_INFO("Scan time: %lf ", msg.ranges[1]);
119  }
120 
121  void scan3Update(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan& msg)
122  {
123  scan3=msg;
124  //ROS_INFO("Scan time: %lf ", msg.ranges[1]);
125  }
126 };
